scripts.test-target-compatibility:original: find . -name '*.js' |egrep -v '.history/|/node_modules/|^./dist/' | xargs -I FILE -n 1 cp --parent -r FILE dist/target-compatibility/original/
scripts.test-target-compatibility: npm run test-target-compatibility:original && npm run test-target-compatibility:babel && npm run test-target-compatibility:normalize && npm run test-target-compatibility:diff
scripts.deploy-demo: git checkout gh-pages && git checkout master packages/demo && cp packages/demo/{examples.js,GitHub.png,Twitter.svg,index.html,index.js} . && rm -rf cp packages/demo && git add . && git commit -m'updated demo' && echo git push to finalize
